price: Sε wͻgye wo akyinnye (wͻ mmoa kum no ho) a, ka sε: ”Nyankopͻn Nim dwuma a modie (nyinaa) “.
arabic: وَإِن جَٰدَلُوكَ فَقُلِ ٱللَّهُ أَعۡلَمُ بِمَا تَعۡمَلُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wa-in jādalūka faquli al-lahu aʿlamu bimā taʿmalūna
